Europa League
Cluj - Rennes: which team for St√©phan?
Stade Rennais is not allowed to make a mistake tonight on the grass of Cluj, to believe in the qualification.
07 Nov 2019, 11:20 by Thomas Rassouli



16-year-old Eduardo Camavinga, staggering with Stade Rennais from Steve Mandanda to Memphis Depay, to the young Eduardo Camavinga, several individuals emerged from the lot this weekend, on the occasion of the second day of Ligue 1. Icon Sport Overview



Steve Mandanda (OM) Icon Sport



Creole Maouassa (Rennes) Icon Sport



Jason Denayer (OL) Icon Sport



Jeremy Gelin (Rennes) Icon Sport



Julien Faussurier (Brest) Icon Sport



Houssem Aouar (OL) Icon Sport



Eduardo Camavinga (Rennes) Icon Sport



Renaud Cohade (Metz) Icon Sport



Memphis Depay (OL) Icon Sport



Habib Diallo (Metz) Icon Sport



Denis Bouanga (Saint-Etienne) Icon Sport

Mandanda, Camavinga, Memphis, ... the typical team of the weekend in Ligue 1




The time is up for reaction for the Rouge et Noir. Currently the last of their group in Europa League, the Britons must return from Cluj with three points to potentially believe in the qualification for the next stage of the competition. To do this, Julien Stephan will have to do without Eduardo Camavinga, suspended, as his guardian Edouard Mendy.




With Salin and Lea-Siliki?




The probable composition of Rennes + 12 üì∑Credit Photo - Demivol√©e

In this configuration, the Rennes coach should line up Salin, back in goal. Da Silva and Gnagnon hinged, Traor√© and Maouassa on the sides, Bourigeaud should be accompanied by Lea-Siliki to recovery in midfield. On the wings, Raphinha and Niang are expected, while in front, Hunou and Del Castillo are expected. Tait and Martin still injured, Grenier is back in the group.
